page.title: 14Tourism
page.content: Although not a tourist haunt, Sutton Benger provides a convenient stopping place, in the 15th century Bell House Hotel or local inn, particularly for American tourists on route from Bath to Stratford-on-Avon. Many holidaymakers pass through the area on their way to resorts in Wales and South-West England, mainly using the M4 motorway. Caravan clubs from other areas make use of the Sutton Benger recreation ground for occasional weekend meetings. Footpaths throughout the area are popular with local residents and visiting Ramblers Associations. Historic churches found in the area attract many visitors, particularly in the summer months.
